laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Laser Doppler retinal blood circulation study
laboratory_examinations.findings: Left superotemporal vein diameter: 178µm, Inferotemporal vein diameter: 176µm (normal, 130 - 160µm), Blood velocity: 8.7 mm/second (75% below normal), Blood flow: 6.6µL/minute.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Similar but less severe changes in the right eye.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Laser Doppler retinal blood circulation study
laboratory_examinations.findings: Decreased blood velocity to 4.7 mm/second, Vessel diameter: 182µm, Blood flow: 3.6µL/minute.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased tortuosity and dot hemorrhages in left eye.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Laser Doppler retinal blood circulation study
laboratory_examinations.findings: Reduction of retinal venous diameters toward normal caliber.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Laser Doppler retinal blood circulation study
laboratory_examinations.findings: Diameter: 125µm, Blood velocity: 23.8 mm/second, Blood flow: 8.8µL/minute.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Visual acuity remained 20/20; retinal veins no longer tortuous and engorged.
